phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
I bet I will scare the pants off Happy with this!
I bet Lucy's reaction would be the best of the bunch!
This is the end for you.
My transmissions to Wally and Millianna are being intercepted!
Now I do not have any idea where they are!
Since you are here for me...
Hey, can we really trust him?
I accept that he was not trying to kill us, but...
I have no intention of making excuses.
Any wizard that would die from something like that would be no match for Jellal.
And I was confident that Natsu would not die.
You people have not realized Natsu's true power.
When Natsu obtains the true power of the dragon,
he will destroy all evil before him!
I cannot wipe around my mouth!
Maybe I really should take this off...
Wait, it will not come off!
He is an enemy, get it?
I told you, it is not a cat!
Even though it is a kitty-cat?
I can see why Jellal said to watch out for you, Boy.
Pretending to be a kitty cat when you are a person?
I cannot use magic all of a sudden!
That is as far as you go, Salamander.
I almost forgot to say my dandy catch phrase.
From the moment you met me...
Natsu, I am so glad you are safe!
And wait, what is with the helmet?
Whatever, just help me get free!
How dare you interrupt my catch phrase!
I will let the talking slide, but the flying?
This thing's not coming off so easy!
Damn it... I am going to have to do that!
Wing Slash of the Fire Dragon!
My revenge on the blockhead is complete!
How long do you plan on wearing that?
Sho and Simon have turned against me.
Wally and Millianna have fallen to Salamander.
This is how it should be.
There is nothing more boring than a one-sided game.
Lord Jellal, let us hurry and capture Erza to begin the ceremony.
This is no longer the time to be playing around.
Then why do not you go, Vidaldus?
It is our turn next, yes?
The Assassin's Guild, Death's Head Caucus.
I will show you the lowest pits of the ultimate hell!
Love and life are fated to be broken asunder, yes?
This eve shall be a festival.
We are from the Death's Head Caucus of the Assassin's Guild.
The Special Guerrilla Squad: Trinity Raven, have arrived.
I am pulling as hard as I can!
You are going to tear my head off!
Now it is the blockhead who is trapped!
I wonder what is with that mask's head-hole?
Our showdown is not over yet, Salamander!
I have already paid you back.
And since Erza and Happy are safe, I do not have any reason to keep fighting.
The true freedom that Jellal talks about...
The world where we can rule...
Both of our pieces are in place.
He can be heard throughout the tower.
Is not it about time to get things started?
I wish to use Erza as the living sacrifice to hold the ceremony to resurrect Zeref.
In other words, if the door to heaven opens, victory is mine.
If you can prevent me from doing that,
However that alone would not be any fun.
So I have assembled three warriors.
If you cannot overcome them, then you will not reach me.
In other words it is a 3 vs. 8 battle royal.
It is possible that the Magic Council will attack this place from the Satellite Square.
With the ultimate magic that returns everything to nothingness, Etherion!
That was not in the deal, Jellal!
We get hit with that, and we are all going to hell!
I have been waiting for a dangerous job like this!
No one knows how long we have left.
But when Etherion is fired, everything will be wiped out.
The game will be over, with no players left.
I will not let anyone harm Sister!
I suppose this Jellal guy is at the top, right?
If that is fired, then everyone will...
All we ever wanted was true freedom...
I do not know what kind of freedom you are searchin' for,
but the freedom we have in Fairy Tail is pretty awesome.
There are ways to cheat at games, right?
Let us head to the very top right away!
That is a nice... scarf... you have got...
Natsu, he is one of the blockhead's buddies!
Which means you are one of Jellal's lackeys?
I was always just pretending to be fooled by Jellal.
Why did he set up this idiotic game?
He is the younger twin brother of a member of the Magic Council, Siegrain.
He must have realized ahead of time that the council would use Etherion.
What, it is some fight between brothers?
Even I do not have any idea what happened between them.
I will not permit you to break the rules!
I will pass judgment upon you in the name of justice!
The Warrior of Justice, Fukuro, is here!
I knew it, he is the enemy!
Do not even try to take that guy on!
The Owl of Justice can see through the darkness!
This must be the Assassin's Guild, Death's Head Caucus!
They do not do proper jobs.
They are the worst kind of guild that specializes in assassination requests!
And the three person team called, Trinity Raven,
assassinated every officer in the Western Army in the Cabria War!
And that guy's one of the members of the squad?
Your evil deeds have reached our guild's ears!
Today this warrior of justice will bury your evil!
Guilds are places where our trust and dreams are gathered together.
They are not places for doing dirty work!
You cannot fight members of the Assassin's Guild!
I do not like those assassination jobs.
I do not like the people who request'them, either.
I do not like that you call it a guild.
And because I do not like'them, I am going to bust'them up!
There is evil in this world that cannot be left alive!
You are one of those who should best disappear!
I are not going to lose to fire, buddy!
You are pretty sturdily built there.
This will be a rare job worth doing!
They are beyond even the rumors...
And there are three of them?
And the game has just begun.
So next we have Fukuro vs. Natsu Dragneel.
I had hoped Natsu would get to the top,
but perhaps he is at a disadvantage.
He is got really sharp ears, so he should be able to hear us from anywhere.
In that case his nose should also be good.
Note: -kun is an honorific used for young boys and people lower than your status.
I wonder why Juvia is searching for Natsu-san together with you, Lucy-san?
Um, what else can we do?
I am worried about Erza, so I am going after Sho!
I will leave you two to find Natsu.
I shall do it for Gray-sama's sake,
but to be stuck with one's rival in love...
I can only imagine the carnage that will ensue!
Look, I am trying really hard not to be involved in this.
Juvia thinks he is pretty good.
Something is wrong with you, seriously.
It is a live performance from hell!
The Assassin's Guild, Death's Head Caucus!
The three warriors that Jellal was talking about, then?
I am one of Trinity Raven.
Hey, you got an interesting body there.
Juvia's body is made of water.
I will just get out of your way, and...
There is no attack that will work against Juvia.
You were not one of the Element 4 for nothing!
You would be pretty scary as an enemy...
It is best to wash out your hair with water in the morning.
Shampooing every day will damage your hair.
How did you break the Water Lock?
But no oil or alcohol, please...
But you girls are not so bad looking!
Being cute is the source of all my troubles.
You will be my succubus today!
So that is as far as the water woman goes, eh?
I will show you the lowest pits of the ultimate hell!
I heard that Erza was lonely and could not get close to anyone as a kid.
I cannot even imagine it now.
I bet that she puts on a tough she will to protect her heart from the pain of her past.
Well she is always wearing armor...
That is not what I meant.
I mean she closes off her heart.
Uh, you are talkin' too complicated.
I do not get you, Happy.
That is'because you are full-open, Natsu.
